backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining all data types (Location, ContactInfo, MedicalRecord, ResearchProject, registration requests, profiles, health records, medical tourism) and implementing access control, blob storage, and CRUD operations for healthcare stakeholders, medical records, and research projects.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features related to PIN code auto-fill functionality, read-only location fields, and post office name field additions across address forms (Careers, Vendors, AmbulanceServices, NgoListing).
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including routing, pages, components, hooks, and utilities, with emphasis on PIN code auto-fill, Royal Teal theming, form styling, and stakeholder registration workflows.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for background, foreground, primary, secondary, accent, destructive, border, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag, favicon reference, and root div mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application router setup using TanStack Router, defining all routes (Home, About, Solutions, Onboarding, Careers, Vendors, Ambulance, NGOs, Network Directory, Network Map, Members, Knowledge Board, Clean Claim Intelligence, Admin Dashboard, Contact, legal pages, Healthcare Support System, Patient Journey) with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/components/Chatbot.tsx: AI chatbot component with expandable floating interface, message history, typing indicator, and contextual responses about healthcare services, RCM, technology solutions, network directory, careers, vendors, ambulance services, and NGOs with contact information (info@aihealthzon.com, +91-8696766966).
React form component using react-hook-form for submitting demo booking requests with fields for name, hospital, designation, mobile, email, city, and message. Includes validation, toast notifications, and calls useSaveDemoBookingRequest mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying AI Health Zon branding, contact email, social media links (Facebook, X, LinkedIn, Instagram), navigation links organized in columns, and legal links (Privacy Policy, Terms of Service). Includes copyright notice and responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps the application with Navigation header, main content area (Outlet), Footer, and WhatsAppButton. Provides consistent structure across all pages.
frontend/src/components/MemberDetailView: Dialog component displaying detailed member profiles for healthcare professionals, vendors, or NGOs. Shows profile information, contact details, specialties/services, and action buttons for WhatsApp and email communication.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Main navigation bar with logo, desktop/mobile menu, and authentication button. Includes links to all major pages (Home, About, Solutions, Network Directory, Members, etc.) with active state highlighting and Internet Identity login/logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/PendingRequestsL: List component that displays pending requests (professional, vendor, ambulance, or NGO) using RequestDetailCard components. Handles loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile setup form for new users to select account type (hospital, professional, vendor, NGO) and enter their name. Uses useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation to create initial user profile.
frontend/src/components/RequestDetailCar: Displays detailed information for registration requests (healthcare professionals, vendors, NGOs, ambulances) with expand/collapse functionality and approve/reject actions. Includes contact information display, document downloads, and WhatsApp/email integration.
frontend/src/components/StakeholderDetai: Modal dialog component that displays comprehensive details for stakeholders (hospitals, vendors, NGOs) including contact information, verification status, and action buttons for WhatsApp, email, and website links.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: Fixed floating button component that opens WhatsApp chat with a hardcoded phone number (918696766966) in a new window.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages the backend actor instance with authentication, creating actors based on Internet Identity state and initializing access control with admin tokens from URL parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralized React Query hooks for all backend API calls including user profiles, admin checks, registration submissions, pending request queries, and approval/rejection mutations for all stakeholder types.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, enterprise color scheme (including Royal Teal and Royal White), form styling, and responsive design utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx: About Us page displaying company mission, vision, values, and team information with a hero section, CTA buttons, and a demo booking modal. Includes sections for trust/integrity, excellence, collaboration, and innovation values with corresponding icons.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard for reviewing and managing stakeholder registration requests (healthcare professionals, vendors, NGOs, ambulances). Includes access control checks, summary cards showing pending counts, and tabbed interface for different request types.
frontend/src/pages/AmbulanceServices.tsx: Ambulance service registration page with form for submitting service details including name, contact, location (auto-filled via PIN code lookup), and service types (emergency, ICU, event). Handles form submission and validation with toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/Blog.tsx: Empty blog page component with no content.
frontend/src/pages/BlogArticle.tsx: Empty blog article page component with no content.
frontend/src/pages/Careers.tsx: Healthcare professional registration/careers page with form for job applications including role selection, experience, location (auto-filled via PIN code), contact details, and CV upload with progress tracking. Supports multiple healthcare roles from doctors to admin staff.
frontend/src/pages/CaseStudies.tsx: Case studies page with hero section and empty state indicating success stories are coming soon. Includes multiple CTAs for demo booking and consultation scheduling.
frontend/src/pages/CleanClaimIntelligenc: Product page showcasing Clean Claim Intelligence solution with 9 validation layers (patient identity, pre-authorization, clinical validity, medical coding, billing consistency, documentation, lifecycle intelligence, fraud analytics, financial accuracy). Includes demo booking modal and detailed feature lists for each validation layer.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page component with hero section, contact information cards (phone, email, location), multiple CTAs for scheduling calls/demos, and a chatbot. Uses a modal dialog with DemoBookingForm for booking interactions.
frontend/src/pages/HealthcareSupportSyst: Healthcare support system page displaying various support categories (workforce, emergency, diagnostics, pharmacy, home healthcare, mental health, vendors, NGOs) with cards and navigation to specific category pages. Handles interest clicks with routing or toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Homepage with auto-rotating hero carousel, metrics display, why-choose-us section, solutions cards with navigation and hash anchors, and demo booking modal. Features RCM-focused messaging with AI-powered healthcare solutions.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgeBoard.tsx: Knowledge board page providing comprehensive information on hospital licensing and regulatory compliance in India. Includes hero section, accordion-based content structure, external research publication links, and demo consultation booking.
frontend/src/pages/Members.tsx: Members directory page displaying approved healthcare professionals, vendors, and NGOs in a grid layout. Fetches data via useGetAllApprovedMembers hook and shows member details in a modal via MemberDetailView component.
frontend/src/pages/NetworkDirectory.tsx: Displays a searchable directory of healthcare stakeholders (hospitals, vendors, NGOs) with filtering by category and location, and a detail view modal for selected entities.
frontend/src/pages/NetworkMap.tsx: Shows a visual network map with statistics and location grid of approved healthcare stakeholders grouped by city across India.
frontend/src/pages/NgoListing.tsx: Provides an NGO registration form with PIN code-based auto-fill for location fields and displays a filterable list of registered NGOs pending approval.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Presents a multi-phase onboarding guide for the 10-step healthcare revenue cycle process, from patient registration through reporting and analytics.
frontend/src/pages/PatientJourney.tsx: Placeholder page for a future patient journey document library feature, currently showing a 'Coming Soon' message.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Static page displaying the platform's privacy policy covering data collection, usage, sharing, security, and user rights.
frontend/src/pages/RefundPolicy.tsx: Static page component displaying AI Health Zon's refund policy with sections on eligibility, request process, processing time, non-refundable items, and cancellations. Uses Card UI components to present policy information with dynamic last-updated date.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions.tsx: Solutions page showcasing Revenue Cycle Management (RCM) features including pre-authorization, medical coding, denial management, and AR tracking. Includes problem statements, impact metrics, FAQ accordion, and a demo booking modal with DemoBookingForm component.
frontend/src/pages/TermsConditions.tsx: Static page component displaying terms of service including acceptance of terms, use of services, user responsibilities, intellectual property, liability limitations, and modification rights. Structured with Card UI components and dynamic last-updated date.
frontend/src/pages/Vendors.tsx: Vendor registration and listing page with form for submitting vendor details (name, category, products, contact, location). Includes PIN code auto-lookup for Indian addresses, form validation, and displays list of all registered vendors using useSubmitVendorRegistration and useGetAllVendors hooks.
frontend/src/utils/pinCodeLookup.ts: Utility function for looking up Indian PIN codes using the India Post API (postalpincode.in) to retrieve district, state, and post office information. Validates 6-digit PIN format and returns structured result with success/error status.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL parameter management utilities supporting both regular query strings and hash-based routing. Provides functions for extracting, storing, and persisting parameters using sessionStorage, plus clearing sensitive parameters from URL hash without page reload.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme with enterprise color palette (enterprise-blue, royal-teal), Inter/Poppins fonts, container settings, custom animations (accordion), and plugins for animations, typography, and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking five existing features related to PIN code-based address auto-fill functionality across multiple forms (Careers, Vendors, AmbulanceServices, NgoListing). Contains three pending feature requests for locking location fields, adding post office name field, and implementing auto-fill based on PIN code lookup.
